DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if Dimebon is safe and effective in patients with moderate to severe Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety and Efficacy Study Evaluating Dimebon (Latrepirdine) in Patients With Moderate to Severe Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: ModeratetoSevere Alzheimer's disease MiniMental State Examination (MMSE) Score between 5 to 14, inclusive Stable on donepezil for at least 6 months Other causes of dementia Major structural brain disease Unstable medical condition or significant hepatic or renal disease
